Description: Fragment of flattened handle from neck join to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine red-buff; cream slip. Diamond stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Xenophantos. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, MGR 1125,1.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (280)
